summary: CAR WON'T START SOMETIMES, UNLESS YOU TAP THE FUSE BOX UNDER THE STEERING COLUMN, THEN IT STARTS.  THERE SEEMS TO BE AN INTERMITTENT ELECTRICAL CONNECTION SOMEWHERE.  THIS IS A SAFETY HAZARD IF YOU STALL IN TRAFFIC AND CAN'T GET THE CAR STARTED.  THE PROBLEM IS ALSO REPORTED BY OTHER OWNERS ON THE INTERNET.  PLEASE REQUIRE KIA TO DO A SAFETY RECALL TO FIX THIS PROBLEM BEFORE SOMEONE GETS HIT AND KILLED.  THIS PROBLEM HAS HAPPENED MANY TIMES.  THANK YOU.    [XXX], [XXX]    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).'*JB
